github_tool_universal.message:
âœ… GitHub Tool unlocked!

ğŸ“ **Setup Required:**
1. Create a GitHub Personal Access Token at https://github.com/settings/tokens
   - Scopes needed: repo, read:user, gist
2. Tell the GPT: 'Set my GitHub token to [your_token]'
3. The GPT will save it and you're ready to use GitHub integration
